title: DJ Sona voice bug
body: This is the 5th time or something that this has happened after a patch update with DJ Sona with her VO she bugs out and says what classic Sona says instead of the random stuff DJ Sona says

replies.body:
Hey Bury Me Alive,

Thanks for the report! 

Were you polymorph'd by Lulu in this game? There's a bug where the audio will mess up when this happens, causing base VO to playing on DJ Sona. This can be fixed by swapping forms. 

We're aware of this issue and are currently investigating the cause of it.
Nope I wasn't polymorph'd by Lulu at all, I just was playing normally and DJ Sona just suddenly bugs out with her voice
Hm, okay. I haven't heard that happening. Would you happen to have more specific repro steps or a video?

This has happened to me as well. Both times it happened in games where there was no Lulu, both times on Howling Abyss during a Poro King game.

I'm not aware whether it's like that from the start or happened during the game, but I'll keep an eye out next time I play that mode.

That'd be super helpful.

I'll hop in a custom game today and poke around myself, too, to see if it's something to do with the map.
With poro king it consistently happens when she takes a poro. Every time 100%. not sure about the other occurrences though. Also notable that changing the track fixes it.
Gahhh, you're the best. That's exactly what's happening. Thanks for the lead!
Nope, I just noticed it while I was playing in the Poro King event and also in Summoners Rift
Okie, no worries! I'm going to check it out myself to see if I can get it to happen. If you see it (hear it?) happen again, please feel free to poke me about it!
